item.title: How to Pass the KCNA - Kubernetes And Cloud Native Associate
item.description: Yesterday I took the Kubernetes and Cloud Native Associate Exam (KCNA) certification exam, and this morning I got the results that I passed, yey!

item.title: Why I failed the Microsoft exam AZ-204 - Developing Solutions for Microsoft Azure
item.description: Last week I failed my first Microsoft certification exam.
